mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gitlab_webhooks ( commitBefore, commitAfter, ref, userId, userName, email, projectId, projectName, projectDescription, repositoryName, repositoryUrl, repositoryDescription, repositoryHomepage, webHooksType, triggerBuild, totalCommitsCount ) VALUES ( #{commitBefore}, #{commitAfter}, #{ref}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{projectDescription}, #{repositoryName}, #{repositoryUrl}, #{repositoryDescription}, #{repositoryHomepage}, #{webHooksType}, #{triggerBuild}, #{totalCommitsCount} );

INSERT INTO gitlab_webhooks_commits ( webHooksId, commitsId, message, timestamp, url, autherName, autherEmail ) VALUES ( #{webHooksId}, #{commitsId}, #{message}, #{timestamp}, #{url}, #{autherName}, #{autherEmail} );
